title: Bug 6410: File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
description: When using code assist, the file is being marked as dirty even though no changes were made.
OB: When using code assist with no suggestions, the file becomes dirty even though no actual changes were made.
EB: If code assist has no suggestions, it should not mark the file as dirty.
SR:
1. Open the file in the IDE.
2. Use code assist with no suggestions.
3. Check if the file is marked as dirty.
